character.data.nature_warden.name: Nature's Warden
character.data.nature_warden.description: When the Conjunction of the Planes occurred, the nature Gods created the Warden to rid the land of the abherrations that now dwell here.
character.data.nature_warden.playstyle: Tuned to the art of transmutation, converting things into other things: Leadership, Mana, Attacks
character.data.nature_warden.description: Small bipedal wooden creature. Wearing a large pack of tree leaves as hair. Carrying a wodden curled up walking stick. Small round wodden eyes.His body covered with tree lines like tatoos.
